name: urdl (Marcos Donnantuoni)
description:
Slide the letters with the arrow keys. Two equal letters "add" into the next letter when they collide (as in 2048 and similar games).

You win when you form valid word(s) in any row or column.

Your score will be the sum of the letters of the words (A = 1, B = 2, etc).

Controls: mouse or arrow keys to slide, R to reset, S to save a screenshot to share.
